S04n497:1: tatra kumāra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadhamāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ prajānāti,
S04n497:2: tasyeme evaṃrūpā guṇānuśaṃsā bhavanti-sa tathāgatānāṃ bhūtaṃ guṇavarṇaṃ bhāṣate |
S04n497:3: na ca tathāgatān vyākhyāti asatā abhūtena |
S04n497:13: iti hi kumāra yatsvabhāvaṃ cittaṃ tatsvabhāvā buddhaguṇāḥ,
S04n497:16: yaḥ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvaguṇasvabhāvanirdeśaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S04n497:17: ayaṃ kumāra ucyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nidhyāptimānasaḥ |
S04n497:23: samatikrāntaḥ kāmabhūmiṃ rūpabhūmiṃ ārūpyabhūmiṃ kleśabhūmiṃ nāmabhūmiṃ ghoṣabhūmim |
S04n497:34: niścitayā buddhyā samanvāgato'nabhibhūtaḥ sarvamāraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhiśca devatābhiḥ ||
S04n497:35: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe aṣṭānavaterniyutānāṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pūrvaparikarmakṛtāyāḥ koṭīśatasahasrāvartāyā dhāraṇyā anāvaraṇāyāśca dharmavipaśyanāyāḥ kṣānteḥ pratilambho'bhūt |
S04n497:36: te ca sarve bhagavatā vyākṛutā aṣṭācatvāriṃśatā kalpairasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante |
S04n497:37: sarve ca anyānyanāmāna ekāyuṣpramāṇā anyānyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante |
S04n497:39: yo bodhisattva matimān prāpnoti anuttarāṃ varāṃ bodhim |
S04n497:40: arthe ca dharmi kuśalo carati sa dharmasvabhāvasmi || 1 ||
S04n497:41: nābhūt bhaṇati vācaṃ buddhānāṃ yādṛśā guṇaviśeṣāḥ |
S04n497:42: sa hi dharmu taṃ jinānāṃ jānati śūro vigatakaṅkṣāḥ || 2 ||
S04n497:43: ekārtha sarvadharmān prajānati ca śūnyatāṃ sa ekāṃśam |
S04n497:44: nānārthu nāsti teṣāṃ ekārthe śikṣito bhavati || 3 ||
S04n497:46: kṣati akṣaye'sya saṃjñā prahīṇa sarvā niravaśeṣā || 4 ||
S04n497:47: na hi rūpato daśabalān paśyati so dharmakāya narasiṃhān |
S04n497:48: nāpi lakṣaṇehi tasya prahīṇa sarve viparyāsāḥ || 5 ||
S04n497:49: dharmā acintya ete cintāpagatā svabhāva upaśāntāḥ |
S04n497:52: sarve ca tatsvabhāvā dharma viśuddhā gaganakalpāḥ || 7 ||
S04n497:53: na hi jāta mānase'sya niḥsaraṇaṃ jñātva sarvadharmāṇām |
S04n497:56: sarvaṃ ca tasya vacanaṃ niścarati jinānubhāvena || 9 ||
S04n497:57: atikrāntu kāmabhūmiṃ kileśabhūmiṃ ca rūpa ārūpyān |
S04n497:59: atikrāntu nāmabhūmiṃ ghoṣo jñāna svabhāvena cayikaḥ |
S04n497:60: yāvacciraṃ pi bhaṇato na vidyate niśrayastasya || 11 ||
S04n497:64: abhibhavati sarvamārān na cāpi teṣāṃ vaśamupaiti || 13 ||
S04n497:66: dhyānasukhasmi nirataḥ prajānati ca śūnyakaṃ lokam || 14 ||
S04n497:67: lokāśca skandha uktāstāṃścāpi sa śūnyakān prajānati |
S04n497:69: ātmānaṃ sa tyajate na caiva śikṣāṃ śrutāṃ daśabalasya |
S04n497:70: so śīlapāramiṃ gata upapadyati yatra praṇidheti || 16 ||
S04n497:72: na svargaṃ prārthayate na cāpi praṇidhānato muktaḥ || 17 ||
S04n497:73: na bhraṃśayati sa vīryaṃ muhūrtamātramapi dharma caramāṇaḥ |
S04n497:78: iha śikṣitvā kuśalo daśabaladhārī bhavati buddhaḥ || 20 ||
